876950.name: PC Check & Tuning 2019 Steam Edition
876950.description:
PC Check & Tuning 2019: Organization. Performance. Security.

With PC Check & Tuning 2019, your computer is in good hands. Optimize your PC for improved performance, more space and enhanced security. This tool offers impressive, long-term results. That means you can focus all of your PC's resources and your passion on your gaming.

Highlights:

  • Organization – we clean up your PC.
    Discover features for creating more space and saving energy: Easily remove worthless data and find large, memory-eating video and image files using PC Check & Tuning 2019. Additionally, you can immediately spend less energy by optimizing the Windows energy options – all without a noticeable loss in your computing power.
  • High-performance – when it matters most.
    With PC Check & Tuning 2019, you optimize Windows services and your system settings for even more speed. Turn on High Speed mode to pool your PC's resources and put them in the processes that need it most – for example, like your games.
  • Data security – protect your PC.
    Uninstall harmful programs, keep your software always up-to-date, and delete data securely and permanently. Thanks to PC Check & Tuning 2019 your computer and your data are always secure.

New in this version:

NEW! Performance Check
How efficient is your PC really? Find out: With the Performance Check in PC Check & Tuning 2019. Learn everything about the performance capabilities and weakness of your computer, so that you can get the best out of it.
Optimized: Realtime protection
PC Check & Tuning 2019 is always alert: Thanks to Autopilot, which runs in the background, errors can be detected in realtime. This way there are no problems in the first place and your PC is constantly protected.
876950.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
